title: Differential form
summary: In the mathematical fields of differential geometry and tensor calculus, differential forms are an approach to multivariable calculus that is independent of coordinates.  Differential forms provide a unified approach to define integrands over curves, surfaces, solids, and higher-dimensional manifolds.
